brand.title: The integrated business expense management solution

company_form.label: What is the form of your company?

individuals_list.title: Check the list of individuals attached to your company
individuals_list.description:
We will need documents for each of the beneficial owners of the company as well as for the legal representative requesting the opening of the Mooncard account.
A beneficial owner is a person holding more than 25% of the capital of the company.
If these people do not appear in the list below, please provide us with their contact details.

checks_list.title: Help us carry out the necessary checks

id_document.title: Identity document
id_document.description: Please provide a color, unexpired, framed, untrimmed and clear document of the identity card (front / back) or passport (double inside page with the signature)

id_verification.title: Identity Verification
id_verification.description: Please provide a color document, non-expired, non-croped, non-blur.

proof_of_address.title: Residence certificate
proof_of_address.description: Please provide a color document, dated less than 3 months ago, framed and clear (eg: last income tax notice, fixed line or box telecommunications bill only, energy and water bill , receipt or rent invoice, etc.)

driving_license.title: Driver's license
driving_license.description: Please provide a color document, non-expired, non-croped, non-blur.

social_security_card.title: Vital card
social_security_card.description: Please provide a color document, non-expired, non-croped, non-blur.

ubo_registry_extract.title: Beneficial owners certificate
ubo_registry_extract.description: Please provide a color document, non-croped, non-blur.

f791c550-7735-4c20-8131-6ff21a92da1e.title: Annual accounts for the past year
